attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2005-0970

Date: 2005-05-19

                     Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable Gene Anne Smith, juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de la Saskatchewan, soit nommée juge de la Cour d'appel de la Saskatchewan, et juge ex officio de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de la Saskatchewan.

 

 


                     The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that the Honourable Gene Anne Smith, a Judge of the Court of Queen’s Bench of Saskatchewan, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal for Saskatchewan, and a Judge ex officio of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Saskatchewan.
attachmentText: PC Number: 2005-0970Date: 2005-05-19                        Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable  Gene Anne Smith, juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de la Saskatchewan, soit nommée juge de la Cour d'appel de la Saskatchewan, et juge ex officio de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de la Saskatchewan.                           The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that  the Honourable Gene Anne Smith, a Judge of the Court of Queen’s Bench of Saskatchewan, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal for Saskatchewan, and a Judge ex officio of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Saskatchewan.
